Package org.kquiet.browser

Class ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.kquiet.browser.ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder
Enclosing class:
ActionComposerBuilder
public class ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder extends Object
A builder to build the actions into a sequence.

  • Method Details

    • returnToComposerBuilder

      public ActionComposerBuilder returnToComposerBuilder()
      Finish building the sequence of actions so far and return control to root builder (ActionComposerBuilder).
      Returns:
      root builder(ActionComposerBuilder)

    • endActionSequence

      public ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder.IfThenElseBuilder endActionSequence()
      Finish building the sequence of actions so far and return control to parent builder (ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder.IfThenElseBuilder).
      Returns:
      parent builder(ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder.IfThenElseBuilder)
      Throws:
      UnsupportedOperationException - if parent builder is not ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder.IfThenElseBuilder.

    • closeWindow

      public ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder closeWindow(boolean closeAllRegistered)
      Add a CloseWindow to the sequence of actions.
      Parameters:
      closeAllRegistered - true: close all regisetered windows; false: close only the focus window.
      Returns:
      self reference

      Type Parameters:
      V - the expected return type of condition function
      Parameters:
      conditionFunc - the condition function for evaluation by phases
      totalTimeout - the maximum amount of time to wait totally

    • selectByIndex

      public ActionComposerBuilder.ActionSequenceBuilder selectByIndex(org.openqa.selenium.By by, Integer... options)
      Add a Select to the sequence of actions, which select by index.
      Parameters:
      by - the element locating mechanism
      options - the option to select; all options are deselected when no option is supplied and the SELECT element supports selecting multiple options
      Returns:
      self reference
